content: This is right on, Devin! This pack mentality is pervasive in American culture and many institutions including our schools of higher education, business and even law enforcement. A lot of people don’t seem to have “grown-up” or evolved in their maturity and understanding of themselves and others, beyond their basest “skills” of high school and adolescence. You don’t have to look far to see despicable, loathsome examples in “social” media comments and attacks and in the observations, conclusions and comments of many of “our” politicians and their “in-group” cronies.
